```{r}
print(w.genes.cancer)

Wgene.krebs <- data.frame(row.names = names(w.genes.cancer), stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

for (gene_name in names(w.genes.cancer)) {
  if (gene_name %in% colnames(breast_damage.exp) && gene_name %in% colnames(breast_damage.cnv)) {
  achilles_value <- breast_achilles_mean[, gene_name]
  exp_value <- breast_exp_mean[, gene_name]
  Wgene.krebs <- cbind(achilles.cnv.exp_breast, achilles_value, exp_value, cnv_value)
}
else {
    warning(paste("Column", gene_name, "does not exist in breast_damage.exp. Skipping."))
  }
}

View(Wgene.krebs)


```
